# How Many Domains Do You Need for Cold Email?

URL: https://howmanydomainsforcoldmail.com
Description: Use 3–5 domains for cold email outreach, with 2–3 mailboxes per domain, giving you 300–1,500 emails per day capacity while maintaining inbox deliverability.

## Quick Answer

Use 3–5 domains for cold email outreach, with 2–3 mailboxes per domain, giving you 300–1,500 emails per day capacity while maintaining inbox deliverability.
